title: Host Analytics Modeling Named Best Financial Planning and Analysis Technology Tool By Innovation Enterprise Group
text:
For Third Consecutive Year, Cloud EPM Leader Honored for Innovation and Technology Leadership
MA (PRWEB) October 07, 2015
It’s been a big year for the world of FP&A as CFOs responded to a host of new challenges thrown up by new technologies, regulations, and a turbulent global economic and geo-political climate.
With this year’s Innovation Enterprise FP&A awards , held at the Seaport World Trade Center, Boston, we honored those who rose to the mark and innovated their way to the top of their field, awarding prizes to firms you voted as industry leaders in 8 categories.
Host Analytics, the leader in cloud-based enterprise performance management (EPM), today announced that Host Analytics Modeling has been named “Best Financial Planning and Analysis Technology Tool” from the Innovation Enterprise.
For the third consecutive year, Host Analytics was honored at the annual FP&A Innovation Summit. The award for “Best Financial Planning and Analysis Technology Tool” featured a rigorous selection process, including a vote by conference attendees, internal evaluation by the Innovation Enterprise Group and a review by the group’s corporate finance advisory board. The board comprises top financial executives from Microsoft, Susquehanna Bank, GE Healthcare, TIAA-CREF, Walmart, IDT Corp., Cardinal Health, Financial Executives Networking Group and Pebble.
Host Analytics Modeling helps customers address critical business planning issues through interactive query and analysis, advanced modeling and Excel-based reporting. These features enable finance and business users to better anticipate business outcomes and collaborate securely across Excel, Web and mobile environments.
"We’re thrilled that the IE Group has honored our Modeling solution as the ‘Best FP&A Technology Tool’ of the year," said Dave Kellogg, CEO for Host Analytics. "Today’s forward-looking organizations view modeling to be an essential part of EPM because of its ability to facilitate ‘what-if’ scenarios that empower key stakeholders to identify opportunities for business growth, while minimizing risk."
Host Analytics is the leader in cloud-based enterprise performance management (EPM), offering a suite of financial applications for modeling, planning, consolidation, reporting and analytics. World-class companies like NEC, Burlington Coat Factory and Sanmina trust Host Analytics to power their strategic financial systems. Host Analytics is a fast-growing, private company backed by leading venture capitalists and is headquartered in Silicon Valley with customers in over 90 countries.
Next year's FP&A Innovation Summit will be held in San Diego on February 17 & 18. The summit will carry on the series of FP&A with new speakers and hot topics. See the summit overview here.
About Innovation Enterprise:
Innovation Enterprise, a CFO Publishing company is an independent business-to-business multi-channel media brand focused on the information needs of Senior Finance, Operations, Analytics, Big Data, Strategy, Digital, Innovation & Sports executives. Products include IE.Summits, ieOnDemand, ieWebinars
